Text:
The synchronized surprise attack on the Cult of
Diablos' Fenrir sect's base in the capital was an
overwhelming success.

After this, the Cult will likely cease activities in
the capital for the time being.

Despite the crushing victory, one person is feeling
blue. That person is... Me.
*sigh*

Hello, Beta. Did you finish dealing with the
aftermath from yesterday's operations?
Oh, Epsilon.

You seem down. What happened to yesterday's high
spirits?

Didn't we practically destroy the Fenrir sect's bases
in the capital? The operation was a great success.
So why are you depressed?

I know, I know. What a great success it was... What an
operation.

What's with that tone of voice? And you look
terrible... Are you tired?

Ahh. You took pains to erase any trace of us. Delta
in particular went on a rampage so it must have
been tough covering our tracks...
As Epsilon talks, Beta's eyes well up with tears.
Aahh...

You look like you're about to cry! Did I say
something wrong?
No, you didn't, but... Ahh...

Ah, I forgot to ask you something about Princess
Alexia's rescue during yesterday's operation...
THE PRINCESS?!
Woah! Don't shout like that!
Carried...
Huh...?
He carried the princess in his arms...
Hmm... I have no idea what you're talking about.

Hey, if something's happened, you should tell me.
You're acting weird.

I'm so sorry, Epsilon. I don't have the energy to
stand here and talk...
Huh?
So...

H-hold on! You've lost me completely now!
So...don't "so" me!
*sigh*

And...off she goes. You could catch a cold with the
temperature difference between today and yesterday...

I wonder what happened... Well, it's none of my
business. Plus I doubt she could talk calmly in
that state.
(Thud)

Returning to her room, Beta throws herself down on
the couch. She stares at the ceiling vacantly and
lies completely still. Her strength has gone.
He cradled the princess in his arms...

I didn't want to see...that. When Master Shadow was
rescuing Princess Alexia... He carried her in his
arms... Oh!

Every girl's dream, and SHE gets to be carried in his
arms...!

Beta leaps to her feet and shakes her head, as if
trying to erase everything.

Hmm. Why am I upset? It's gossip... Spread by people
who weren't there. Don't be taken in by false rumors.

By the time I got there, the princess was already
back under the Dark Knights' protection.

With all those people around, Master Shadow wouldn't
have needed to carry her in his arms.

Teehee. If I think about it clearly, it could only be
hearsay. People enjoy spreading annoying rumors.

That girl was just bait that Master Shadow used for
the current operation... Yes, no doubt about it.

After finally calming down and catching her breath,
Beta whispers the following words.
I...wish he would carry me in his arms.

Oh! What am I saying?! I just blurted out my heart's
desire.
M-Master Shadow? Have you come to rescue me?!

I couldn't leave my special, silver-haired, little
elven girl to someone else. I decided to drop
everything and come save you.
I'm so happy you'd do that for me...

You've been captive a long time, so you must be
unsteady on your feet. Grab hold of me.

R-Really... W-Will you carry me in your arms?
I couldn't possibly impose on you, Master Shadow.

There's no need for formalities. Right, put your
weight on me.
O-Okay... I hope I'm not too heavy.

You can put your whole body weight on me. It'll make
me happy to have you resting in these arms.
I'm so happy... Ping!

Oh, why couldn't he carry me in his arms! I want it
soooo much!

Alpha and Epsilon pause while sorting documents taken
from the Cult of Diablos's hideout.
I heard Beta's voice just now...
Me too. Loud enough to echo through the base.
What's up with her?
Let's pretend we didn't hear.

Yes, you're right. I don't think we should get
involved.

They both nod and calmly return to work as if nothing
had happened.
